judgment_text:
IN THE HIGH COURT OF JUDICATURE AT BOMBAY
 ORDINARY ORIGINAL CIVIL JURISDICTION
 SUIT NO. 1868 OF 1979
 M/s. Ajanta Hsg. Corpn. .. Plaintiffs.
 vs.
 S.B. Bhatt & Ors. .. Defendnts.
 Mr. Nadia Bhatia i/by P.S. Gidwani present.
 CORAM : S.U. KAMDAR, J.
 DATE : 17th March, 2006.
 P.C.:
 . In the present matter, Mr. H.C. Tunara,
 advocate for the plaintffs and C.C. Chhaya advocate
 for the defendants both had passed away. Department
 does not have record and proceedings. The advocate
 Ms. Nadia Bhatia appearing states that Mr. Gidwani
 was appearing for and on behalf of C.C. Chhaya.
 From the board I find that there are also names of
 Wadia Gandhy & Co. and M.V. Kini & Co.
 Accordingly, I direct both the advocates to remain
 present in Curt on next Friday so as to enable the
 reconstruction of the records and proceedings. The
 office to intimate the aforesaid to both the
 advocates. No notice can be given to the parties
because the Court does not have any record and
 proceedings and papers. Thus no addresses are
 available. However, I direct the office to make a
 search of the records and proceeding and make a
 report by next Friday.
